scenario_text.value:
Dammit! Did the Master’s cronies do this,
too? The heck’d they come here for?!
I was wondering that myself.
Hrmm? Could this be...?
What is it, Falcomon?

I scouted around the area, but all of the
fallen are gathered in the same areas.

Almost like breadcrumbs left in the enemy’s
wake.

Are you saying the enemy is heading someplace
and attacked anyone who got in their way?

You’re kidding... They’d do all this just
’cause someone happened to cross their path?
(Minoru’s hands are shaking... Is he scared?)
Somehow, I’m...super friggin’ pissed...!
Indeed... I share your fury.
(Oh, rage was making his body quiver.)

(Minoru’s gotten pretty tough in the time
I was gone.)

(Still, I don’t blame him for feeling that
way. Even I get upset seeing this...)

(Somehow, I...want to tell Minoru how I feel
right now!)
(What should I say to him?)
We’ll save them all.
We’ll beat the Master.
We’ll save them all.

Minoru... We’ll definitely save everyone, by
our own power!

In this world, in our world... We’ll save
them all!
By our power...
Yeah, you’re right! Miyuki too, of course!
Minoru...!
Everyone includes Miyuki after all, right?
Of course! Thanks, Minoru!
We’ll beat the Master.

All of this will end if we defeat the Master.
That’s why...
He’s gotta go down, by our hands!
Yeah... That’s the only way, ain’t it?

We’ll beat the Master, take back Miyuki, and
put an end to all of this.

Now that that’s settled, we’d better find the
Master and do something about him!

I’ll do what I can. You gotta back me up,
yeah, Falcomon? I’m counting on you!

But of course, I have both your back and your
front!

(He really has become someone to rely on. I’d
better follow suit!)

No idea when the enemy’s gonna show up. Gotta
keep our head in the game, here.
